Articles.Content:
KSP 1.0

I have a felling that new version has more, more lags than 0.90. Lags are every few seconds. All settings are setted for minimal. I haven't so good hardware, but previous version works... better. I thought that optimisation is one of the more important things that devs work ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Intel i7 M640

NVS 3100m
